module.title: Resource: Database: Lock
module.author: Christian Würker
module.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>locks`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>locks` ( `lockId` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `userId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `subject` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `entryId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `timestamp` decimal(12,0) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`lockId`), KEY `userId` (`userId`), KEY `subject` (`subject`), KEY `entryId` (`entryId`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
